group_1.narration: — Mel —@All 4 cards I drew so far look pretty grim!
— Mel —@But there's still hope!@Maybe this next card'll turn it all around!
— Mel —@The 5th card in today's fortune reading is...
— Mel —@It'd be dangerous to even step outside.
— Mel —@I'd better stay home sick from school...
I spend every morning reading my fortune@like this. It's part of my routine.
See, my predictions always come true.
So I never leave the house if@the forecast looks ominous.
Staying put is the safest option on@those days. I know that for sure.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...
The outlook's really grave today!
I can't risk setting a single foot outside@this house!

group_1.textRight: I'll call school to tell them you won't@be coming today.

group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry, you came all this way, but I'm@afraid Mel won't be going today.

group_1.textRight: Hm... Did she read her fortune again?

group_1.textLeft: She sure did.
This morning she was in a panic, yelling@"I can't leave the house!"
What am I going to do with her?
Mel! Kanagi is here to see you!

group_1.textRight: Thank you. I won't be long.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:303701:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wha... Kanagi?!

group_1.textRight: Mel...I'll only ask this once. What in@the world are you doing?

group_1.textLeft: What am I doing?
I'm staying inside, that's what! My fortune@for today was REALLY bad!

group_1.textRight: Man, you can be such a pain.
You shouldn't fret over every single fortune@you tell.

group_1.textLeft: What do you mean?!
You think it's better I tag along with you?@You don't even care about fortunes!
That's just inviting more bad luck!
It happens every time...
When you drag me out after a bad reading,@I'M the one who suffers for it.
Just leave me alone, okay?!

group_1.textRight: No, as your friend, I can't allow it.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:303701:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]N-nooo! What are you doing?! Let go of@meee!
So WHAT?!

group_1.textCenter: See, it feels great to breathe in the fresh@air.

group_1.textLeft: That's not the problem!
